revised_title: Organocopper Clusters: Synthesis, Structure, and Reactions
tldr: The article discusses the synthesis, structure, and chemistry of organocopper clusters. It describes the isolation and structural characterization of thermally stable, hydrocarbon-soluble organocopper compounds containing aryl, alkenyl, and alkynyl ligands. The article also explores the dynamic behavior of organo ligands in arylcopper clusters and specific carbon-carbon bond formation reactions occurring at the surface of organocopper clusters.
